column1: Your GitHub repository path is not defined.
column3: $r = Read-Host "Insert your GitHub repository path`n"; Add-Content "$env:appdata\NiniShell\ninishell.cfg" "REPO=$r"
column6: You need to provide the path to your NiniShell repository. The string expected is in this pattern: {username/repo}; 'pMattheew/NiniShell'
